content:
Sure, here are some additional features that could help increase community engagement in your app:

11. User-generated content: Allow members to create and share their own content, such as photos, videos, and blog posts, to encourage engagement and foster creativity.
12. Leaderboards: Create leaderboards to highlight the most active and engaged members of the community, and provide incentives for members to move up the ranks.
13. Mentoring and coaching: Allow members to connect with mentors and coaches who can offer guidance and support on various topics related to the community.
14. Virtual events and webinars: Host virtual events and webinars featuring industry experts and thought leaders to educate and engage members of the community.
15. Feedback and support: Allow members to provide feedback and support to each other, and provide resources for members who need help or guidance.
16. Recognition and rewards: Recognize and reward members who contribute to the community in meaningful ways, such as by sharing valuable insights or helping others.
17. Language support: Provide support for multiple languages to attract and engage members from different parts of the world.
18. Integration with other tools and platforms: Integrate with other tools and platforms, such as email marketing software or project management tools, to streamline communication and collaboration within the community.
19. Customization options: Allow members to customize their experience by choosing their own themes, settings, and preferences.
20. Analytics and reporting: Provide analytics and reporting tools to track engagement and identify areas for improvement, and use this data to make data-driven decisions for the future of the community.
